event_name: First Artificial Neuron
summary: First artificial neuron in computer science.

event_name: Paper: Computing Machinery and Intelligence
summary: Philosophical paper on AI. Introduced the Turing Test.

event_name: Dartmouth Workshop
summary: First AI conference. Coined the term 'Artificial Intelligence'.

event_name: Paper: Learning representations by back-propagating errors
summary: Introduced backpropagation algorithm for training neural networks.

event_name: Paper: Backpropagation applied to handwritten zip code recognition
summary: First successful application of backpropagation algorithm and convolutional nets.

event_name: Paper: GradientBased Learning Applied to Document Recognition
summary: LeNet-5, a pioneering 7-level convolutional network.

event_name: Paper: ImageNet Classification with Deep Convolutional Neural Networks
summary: Won the ImageNet LSVRC-2010 contest

event_name: Paper: Linguistic Regularities in Continuous Space Word Representations
summary: Word embeddings captures syntactic and semantic regularities in language.

event_name: Paper: DeepFace: Closing the Gap to Human-Level Performance in Face Verification
summary: DeepFace is a deep learning facial recognition system created by a research group at Facebook.

event_name: Paper: Generative Adversarial Networks
summary: Introduced GANs

event_name: Paper: Neural Machine Translation by Jointly Learning to Align and Translate
summary: Introduced attention mechanism in neural networks.

event_name: Paper: Very Deep Convolutional Networks for Large-Scale Image Recognition
summary: Introduced VGGNet

event_name: Paper: Going Deeper with Convolutions
summary: Introduced GoogLeNet / Inception

event_name: Paper: A Unified Embedding for Face Recognition and Clustering
summary: Introduced FaceNet

event_name: Paper: U-Net: Convolutional Networks for Biomedical Image Segmentation
summary: Introduced U-Net which is widely used in image segmentation.

event_name: Paper: YOLO (You Only Look Once): Unified, Real-Time Object Detection
summary: Introduced YOLO, a real-time object detection system.

event_name: Paper: A Neural Algorithm of Artistic Style
summary: Introduced Neural Style Transfer which combines the content of an image with the style of another image.

event_name: Paper: Deep Residual Learning for Image Recognition
summary: Introduced ResNet which won the ImageNet LSVRC-2015 contest.

event_name: Course: Deep Learning Specialization
summary: Deep Learning Specialization on Coursera which I also completed.

event_name: Paper: Language Models are Unsupervised Multitask Learners
summary: GPT-2, LLMs are multitalented models that can perform a variety of tasks.

event_name: Paper: Language Models are Few-Shot Learners
summary: GPT-3, LLMs can perform tasks with very few examples.

event_name: Paper: Indexing by latent semantic analysis
summary: Introduced Latent Semantic Analysis (LSA) which is used in information retrieval and NLP.

event_name: Paper: A Neural Probabilistic Language Model
summary: Introduced Neural Language Models.

event_name: Paper: Efficient Estimation of Word Representations in Vector Space
summary: Introduced Word2Vec.

event_name: Paper: Attention is All You Need
summary: Introduced the Transformer model which is the basis for many NLP models.

event_name: Paper: Improving Language Understanding by Generative Pretraining
summary: Introduced GPT-1 which is a large-scale unsupervised language model.

event_name: Paper: Attention is All You Need
summary: Introduced the Transformer model which is the basis for many NLP models.

event_name: Paper: Matching and prediction on the principle of biological classification
summary: First step in decision tree learning.

event_name: Book: Classification and Regression Trees
summary: Introduced CART which is a decision tree learning algorithm.

event_name: Book: C4.5: Programs for Machine Learning
summary: Introduced C4.5 which is a decision tree learning algorithm.

event_name: Paper: Random Decision Forests
summary: Introduced Random Forests which is an ensemble learning method.

event_name: Paper: A decision-theoretic generalization of on-line learning and an application to boosting
summary: Introduced AdaBoost which is an ensemble learning method.

event_name: Paper: Random Forests
summary: About random forests.

event_name: Paper: Multiclass AdaBoost
summary: Introduced Multiclass AdaBoost.
